primevc.gui.display.Window

type
class
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisablable
IDisplayContainer
subclasses
primevc.gui.core.UIWindow
Window is wrapper class for the stage. It provides each Sprite and Shape with the ability to talk with the stage in a platform-indepedent way.

Static Methods

inline startup<WindowInstance>(windowClassFactory : Stage -> WindowInstance) : WindowInstance

Constructor

new(target : Stage)

Event dispatched when the window gets focus

Event dispatched when the window loses focus

rect(default,null) : primevc.core.geom.IntRectangle

tabEnabled : Bool

tabIndex : Int

target(default,null) : Stage

Target is the original, platform-specific, root object. Although this property is set as public, it's not recommended to use this property directly!
